job.title: Data and Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: JLL Technologies Enterprise Data team is a newly established central organization that oversees JLLs data strategy Enterprise Analytics team provides datadriven expertise to various product teams and business lines The data and ML engineer is responsible for designing implementing and maintaining data pipelines data products and services that will power data products built by the team The successful candidate is a curious problemsolver and selfstarter that thrives in a fastpaced environmentbrbrstronguKey ResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliLead new projects and initiatives through
